| **[Reference](/wiki/Source_code "Source code")**                                                                                                                                                                                                 | [SLASH'EM\_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line1278](/wiki/SLASH%27EM_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line1278 "SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2/monst.c") |

A **giant badger** is a type of [monster](/wiki/Monster "Monster") that appears in [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"), [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM") and [Hack'EM](/wiki/Hack%27EM "Hack'EM"). In SLASH'EM and SlashTHEM, it is a [quadruped](/wiki/Quadruped "Quadruped") that shares a glyph with the [rothe](/wiki/Rothe "Rothe"), q - in Hack'EM, it is a [rodent](/wiki/Rodent "Rodent"), r, that shares a glyph with several others.

Giant badgers are [carnivorous](/wiki/Carnivorous "Carnivorous") [animalss](/wiki/Animals "Animals") that possess two claw attacks and a bite attack.

## Generation

Giant badgers are always generated hostile, and will not be randomly generated in [Gehennom](/wiki/Gehennom "Gehennom").

## Strategy

Giant badgers are faster than rothes and possess slightly better AC, but their melee attacks deal considerably less damage. Overall, they are fairly unthreatening.

- *This page is a **[stub](/wiki/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Giant_badger\&action=edit)*

Giant badger

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
q giant badger
Difficulty 4
Attacks Claw 1d2, Claw 1d2, Bite 1d3
q giant badger
Difficulty 4
Attacks

Claw 1d2, Claw 1d2, Bite 1d3

Base level 2
Base experience 17
Speed 12
Base AC 6
Base MR 0
Alignment 0 (neutral)
Frequency (by normal means) 1 (Very rare)
Genocidable Yes
Weight 200
Nutritional value 50
Size Medium
Resistances None
Resistances conveyed None

A giant badger:

  • has no hands.
  • is an animal.
  • is carnivorous.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • does not appear in Gehennom.
Reference SLASH'EM_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line1278

A giant badger is a type of monster that appears in SLASH'EM, SlashTHEM and Hack'EM. In SLASH'EM and SlashTHEM, it is a quadruped that shares a glyph with the rothe, q - in Hack'EM, it is a rodent, r, that shares a glyph with several others.

Giant badgers are carnivorous animalss that possess two claw attacks and a bite attack.

Generation

Giant badgers are always generated hostile, and will not be randomly generated in Gehennom.

Strategy

Giant badgers are faster than rothes and possess slightly better AC, but their melee attacks deal considerably less damage. Overall, they are fairly unthreatening.

This page is a stub. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by expanding this page.
Retrieved from "https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Giant_badger&oldid=159993"

A '''giant badger''' is a type of [[monster]] that appears in [[SLASH'EM]], [[SlashTHEM]] and [[Hack'EM]]. In SLASH'EM and SlashTHEM, it is a [[quadruped]] that shares a glyph with the [[rothe]], {{monsym|giant badger}} - in Hack'EM, it is a [[rodent]], {{brown|r}}, that shares a glyph with several others.

Giant badgers are [[carnivorous]] [[animals]]s that possess two claw attacks and a bite attack.

==Generation==
Giant badgers are always generated hostile, and will not be randomly generated in [[Gehennom]].

==Strategy==
Giant badgers are faster than rothes and possess slightly better AC, but their melee attacks deal considerably less damage. Overall, they are fairly unthreatening.
